semantic_identifier: [GOLD-50]: Expose messaging divergence results in UI and trigger alerts for high inconsistency
title: Expose messaging divergence results in UI and trigger alerts for high inconsistency

sections.text: Add a lightweight UI surface in Customer_Analyzer to display the messaging consistency audit results (from GOLD-48) by segment and channel, including the divergence score and the specific missing/altered value props, differentiators, and proof points. Implement threshold-based alerting (Slack/email) when divergence exceeds a configurable limit, linking to the relevant segment/channel details view. This focuses on reducing organizational drift by making inconsistencies visible and actionable without changing the underlying audit computation.
